name: slepc4py
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: slepc4py
  version: "3.23.2"
  build: 1
  version_xy: ${{ (version | split('.'))[:2] | join('.') }}

package:
  name: ${{ name }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6c98e6c728b9d440d1680047f623aead03d9870c0c4d2ea97c754bab291d1fb5

build:
  number: ${{ build }}
  skip: win
  script:
    - export PETSC_DIR=$PREFIX
    - export SLEPC_DIR=$PREFIX
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip -v install --no-deps .

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler("c") }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cython >=3
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - numpy
        - if: mpi == 'openmpi'
          then:
            - ${{ mpi }}
  host:
    - python
    - cython >=3
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - numpy
    - ${{ mpi }}
    - if: device == 'host'
      then:
        - slepc ${{ version_xy }}.* ${{ scalar }}_*
      else:
        - slepc ${{ version_xy }}.* ${{ device }}_${{ scalar }}_*
    - petsc4py ${{ version_xy }}.*
  run:
    - python
    - petsc4py ${{ version_xy }}.*
  run_constraints:
    - mpi4py >=3.0.1

tests:
  - python:
      pip_check: true
      imports:
        - slepc4py

about:
  summary: Python bindings for SLEPc
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  homepage: https://gitlab.com/slepc/slepc

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dalcinl
    - joseeroman
    - minrk
